mapper.select:
SELECT SAMPLE_CD, SAMPLE_NM, PARENT_SAMPLE_CD, SAMPLE_LEVEL, SORT_ORDER, IS_USE, FILE_PATH, CONTENT, KEYWORD, NOTE FROM SP_SAMPLE
OR SAMPLE_CD LIKE concat('%',#{KEYWORD},'%') OR SAMPLE_NM LIKE concat('%',#{KEYWORD},'%') OR FILE_PATH LIKE concat('%',#{KEYWORD},'%') OR CONTENT LIKE concat('%',#{KEYWORD},'%') OR KEYWORD LIKE concat('%',#{KEYWORD},'%') OR NOTE LIKE concat('%',#{KEYWORD},'%')
AND IS_USE = #{IS_USE}
ORDER BY SAMPLE_CD, SORT_ORDER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SP_SAMPLE(SAMPLE_CD, SAMPLE_NM, PARENT_SAMPLE_CD, SAMPLE_LEVEL, SORT_ORDER, IS_USE, FILE_PATH, CONTENT, KEYWORD, NOTE) VALUES (#{SAMPLE_CD}, #{SAMPLE_NM}, #{PARENT_SAMPLE_CD}, #{SAMPLE_LEVEL}, #{SORT_ORDER}, #{IS_USE}, #{FILE_PATH}, #{CONTENT}, #{KEYWORD}, #{NOTE})
mapper.select:
SELECT id , SEQ , CUST_NM , CUST_TEL_NO , CUST_EMAIL , PRDT_CMPNY_NM FROM SP_CUSTOMER_ORDER WHERE 1=1
AND CUST_NM LIKE concat('%',#{custNm},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SP_CUSTOMER_ORDER (id , SEQ , CUST_NM , CUST_TEL_NO , CUST_EMAIL , PRDT_CMPNY_NM) VALUES( (SELECT (MAX(id)+1) FROM SP_CUSTOMER_ORDER AS SP_ORDER) , (SELECT (MAX(id)+1) FROM SP_CUSTOMER_ORDER AS SP_ORDER) , #{custNm} , #{custTelNo} , #{custEmail} , #{prdtCmpnyNm})
mapper.select:
SELECT id , SEQ , CUST_NM , CUST_TEL_NO , CUST_EMAIL , PRDT_CMPNY_NM FROM SP_CUSTOMER_ORDER WHERE 1=1
AND CUST_NM LIKE concat('%',#{CUST_NM},'%')
